comments_since_last_sample.body: This bill will do nothing but give the Democrats more power and big pay days for them and their friends

If "Recall" Newsome can stay in office...
I wouldn't put it past Democrats to squeeze this one out for McCauliff.
I hate to think they're getting better and better at manipulating the voting system.

The Progressives "kept their word" to whom, Harold?
To an ultra minority handful of other Progressives who want the same thing?
Yeah.
That's looking out for majority American interests.
I'am going to sneak into Mexico, cross back to the US & collect 450000. Later....Let's go Brandon!!!
